sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"选择"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: choice, alternative, preference, option, selection, election
means: choice ： 侧重指自由选择的权利或特权。
alternative ： 指在相互排斥的两者之间作严格的选择，也可指在两者以上中进行选择。
preference ： 侧重因偏见、爱好或判断等而进行选择。
option ： 着重特别给予的选择权利或权力，所选物常常相互排斥。
selection ： 指作广泛的选择，着重选择者的识别力或鉴赏力。
election ： 强调目的和达到目的判断能力。

sentence.Network_en: He won last month's presidential election by a landslide.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以压倒性多数赢得上月的总统选举。

sentence.Network_en: The election was held six months ahead of schedule.
We'll face a tough fight in the upcoming election.
sentence.Network_cn: 在即将到来的选举中，我们将面临一场恶斗。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin electio(n-), from eligere 'pick out' (see elect)

entry.def: An election is a process in which people vote to choose a person or group of people to hold an official position.

example.ex: ...the first fully free elections for more than fifty years...
example.tran: 50多年来第一次完全自由的选举

example.ex: During his election campaign he promised to put the economy back on its feet...
example.tran: 在竞选活动中，他承诺恢复经济活力。

entry.def: The election of a particular person or group of people is their success in winning an election.

example.ex: ...the election of the Labour government in 1964.

means.word_mean: 1. a vote to select the winner of a position or political office;

sentences.sentence: "the results of the election will be announced tonight"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of selecting someone or something; the exercise of deliberate choice;

sentences.sentence: "her election of medicine as a profession"

means.word_mean: 3. the status or fact of being elected;
4. the predestination of some individuals as objects of divine mercy (especially as conceived by Calvinists)

collect[v.收集]+ion表名词→n.收藏[品],收集[物]
collect[v.收集]+ive……的→adj.集体的,共同的 n.集体
elect[v.选举,推选;选择,作出选择]+ion表名词→n.选举,选择权;当选

intel=inter在……中间+lect选择,收集→在中间选出的人→智者
intellect[n.理智,智力,才智]+ual……的→n.知识分子 adj.智力的,理智的,有理解力的
recollect[v.回忆,想起,记起,忆起,记得]+ion表名词→n.回忆
select[v.选出]+ion表名词→n.选择,挑选;选集,精选物
acro高+lect讲,读,说→高层说的话
dia对着+lect讲,读,说→两个对着说→方言
idio个人的+lect说→个人说的话
neg没有+lect选择,收集→没有选出→疏忽
lect讲,读,说+ure表名词→n.&v.演讲,讲课
col共同+lect选择→放在一起选择→收集

stems_affixes.value_cn: 选举,推选;选择,作出选择

se分开+lect选→选出分开
